user_question: How can I use machine learning to predict the stock market trends and generate a visualization of a neural network architecture suitable for this task?
final_answer: To predict stock market trends using machine learning, you can use a Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) neural network, which is effective for time series prediction. A visualization of a suitable LSTM architecture has been generated. Example preprocessing steps include normalizing the data, creating time windows, and splitting data into training and test sets.
